FailSafe.name: Fail Safe
FailSafe.description: Sends a notification if a trap is disabled or set off.
FailSafe.effect: Sends a notification if a trap is disabled or set off.

Gunpowder.name: Gunpowder
Gunpowder.description: Granulated black powder used as a propellant.
Gunpowder.effect: Granulated black powder used as a propellant.

HobgoblinDetonator.name: Hobgoblin Detonator
HobgoblinDetonator.description: Detonates up to ten explosive devices simultaneously.
HobgoblinDetonator.effect: Detonates up to ten explosive devices simultaneously.

HobgoblinPus.name: Hobgoblin Pus
HobgoblinPus.description: Clay-like explosive material that creates a large explosion.
HobgoblinPus.effect: Clay-like explosive material that creates a large explosion.

ProximityTrigger.name: Proximity Trigger
ProximityTrigger.description: Sets conditions for when traps go off including countdowns and mob type.
ProximityTrigger.effect: Sets conditions for when traps go off including countdowns and mob type.

BrindleGrubSlime.name: Brindle Grub Slime
BrindleGrubSlime.description: Harvested from the trails left by the elusive Brindle Grub, this thick slime is both a crafting component and a biohazard. Great for sticky traps or gluing together relationships on the verge of collapse.

FairyDust.name: Fairy Dust
FairyDust.description: No, not the kind that makes you fly. This dust makes you hallucinate and question all your life choices. Handy for making mind-altering potions or confetti for your enemies' funerals.

SquidInk.name: Squid Ink
SquidInk.description: Extracted from the Saccathian’s many tentacles, this ink can either write your memoirs or blot out the sun for a few moments. Your choice.

RatHooliganLeather.name: Rat Hooligan Leather
RatHooliganLeather.description: Tough and surprisingly stylish, this leather from Rat Hooligans is perfect for making armor that says, “I might pick your pocket, but I’ll look good doing it.”

ArcaneBattery.name: Arcane Battery
ArcaneBattery.description: Ever wanted a piece of a sorcerer’s soul in your pocket? Now you can! This miniature power cell is perfect for powering your magical devices or just lighting up your miserable existence. Warning: May contain traces of despair.

SoulThread.name: Soul Thread
SoulThread.description: Spun from the tortured souls of the dearly departed, this thread is both unbreakable and incredibly unsettling. Great for stitching together your magical garments or just sewing seeds of horror.

GorgonEye.name: Gorgon Eye
GorgonEye.description: Petrified and still judging your life choices, this eye can turn anything to stone with one withering glare. Ideal for making petrifying weapons or just ensuring you always win at staring contests.

EchoCrystal.name: Echo Crystal
EchoCrystal.description: This crystal captures and stores sounds, from sweet nothings to blood-curdling screams. Use it to make replayable messages or just annoy your neighbors to death.

ShadowSilk.name: Shadow Silk
ShadowSilk.description: Woven from the darkness between stars, this silk is light-absorbing and almost impossible to see. Perfect for crafting stealth gear or just disappearing when the bill arrives.

PhoenixAshes.name: Phoenix Ashes
PhoenixAshes.description: Collected from the smoldering remains of a reborn phoenix, these ashes are perfect for whipping up resurrection potions or adding a little fire to your chili recipe. Results may vary.

GhostlyEssence.name: Ghostly Essence
GhostlyEssence.description: A vial of ectoplasm from the most chatty of ghosts. Use it to make items that let you talk to the dead or just freak out your friends at sleepovers.

BloodMoonShard.name: Blood Moon Shard
BloodMoonShard.description: A fragment of a cursed moon, this shard enhances blood magic and looks great as jewelry. Handle with care, unless you enjoy unexpected blood sacrifices.

DragonScaleDust.name: Dragon Scale Dust
DragonScaleDust.description: Ground from ancient dragon scales, this dust is magical and slightly explosive. Perfect for enchanting weapons or causing chaos at your next party.

LivingVine.name: Living Vine
LivingVine.description: A piece of vine that’s still very much alive and loves to strangle anything it touches. Perfect for making animated traps or just very aggressive houseplants.

ClockworkHeart.name: Clockwork Heart
ClockworkHeart.description: The ticking heart of a clockwork automaton. Great for bringing mechanical creations to life or just making your enemies wonder when it’ll explode.

NecroticBone.name: Necrotic Bone
NecroticBone.description: A bone infused with dark energy, perfect for necromantic rituals or just making sure your skeletons stay in line. Great for those with a bone to pick.

StarfireEmber.name: Starfire Ember
StarfireEmber.description: A burning ember from a fallen star, this piece is perfect for creating fire-based weapons or keeping your tea eternally warm. Handle with oven mitts.

EnchantedMoss.name: Enchanted Moss
EnchantedMoss.description: Glowing moss with incredible healing properties. Great for crafting regenerative potions or adding some flair to your swamp-themed decor.

SirensHair.name: Siren’s Hair
SirensHair.description: Strands of hair from a siren, enchanted to be irresistibly alluring. Use it to make charm potions or just give yourself that extra volume.

VolcanicGlass.name: Volcanic Glass
VolcanicGlass.description: Sharp and dangerous, this glass is formed from cooled lava. Ideal for making piercing weapons or just really edgy mirrors.

VoidCrystal.name: Void Crystal
VoidCrystal.description: A piece of crystallized nothingness, perfect for making items that consume light and matter. Warning: Staring too long may cause existential dread.

LightningRod.name: Lightning Rod
LightningRod.description: A rod that captures and stores lightning. Great for crafting electrical weapons or just giving your enemies a shocking experience.

BansheeWail.name: Banshee Wail
BansheeWail.description: A captured scream of a banshee in a vial. Perfect for sound-based traps or ensuring no one ever gets a good night’s sleep again.

FrozenTear.name: Frozen Tear
FrozenTear.description: A tear from an ice elemental, frozen solid. Ideal for crafting frost weapons or keeping your drinks cold indefinitely. Ice, ice, baby.

DoppelgangerClay.name: Doppelgänger Clay
DoppelgangerClay.description: Malleable clay that mimics any material it touches. Perfect for creating disguises or really high-stakes pottery classes.

LichsPhylacteryShard.name: Lich’s Phylactery Shard
LichsPhylacteryShard.description: A fragment of a lich’s soul container, pulsating with dark energy. Useful for making powerful dark artifacts or giving your enemies a very bad day.

MysticHoney.name: Mystic Honey
MysticHoney.description: Produced by enchanted bees, this honey is magical and delicious. Great for potions or making your tea taste like victory.

TitansToenail.name: Titan's Toenail
TitansToenail.description: Disgustingly large and strong, this toenail can be ground into a powder to enhance strength potions or gross people out at dinner parties.

CelestialFeather.name: Celestial Feather
CelestialFeather.description: A feather from an angelic being, glowing with divine light. Perfect for making holy weapons or adding some celestial chic to your wardrobe.

DemonicInk.name: Demonic Ink
DemonicInk.description: Ink made from demon blood, ideal for writing cursed contracts or edgy tattoos. Guaranteed to void warranties and souls.

Sand.name: Sand
Sand.description: Fine grains of silica, perfect for making glass or just getting into places you didn’t know you had.

ScrapMetal.name: Scrap Metal
ScrapMetal.description: A pile of rusty, twisted metal pieces. Ideal for makeshift weapons or patching up old armor.
ScrapMetal.effect: Used for repairs and crafting weapons.

SubwayTokens.name: Subway Tokens
SubwayTokens.description: Old tokens from a defunct subway system. Useful for enchanting with teleportation spells or as currency in a pinch.

OldHat.name: Old Hat
OldHat.description: A well-worn hat that’s seen better days. Perfect for disguises or just keeping the sun out of your eyes.

BrokenMirror.name: Broken Mirror
BrokenMirror.description: Shards of a once-beautiful mirror. Great for creating reflective surfaces or bad luck charms.
BrokenMirror.effect: Used in reflective items and curses.

LeatherStraps.name: Leather Straps
LeatherStraps.description: Strips of tough leather, useful for bindings or creating rudimentary armor.

GlassBottles.name: Glass Bottles
GlassBottles.description: Empty bottles waiting to be filled with potions or Molotov cocktails.

CopperWire.name: Copper Wire
CopperWire.description: Thin, flexible wire ideal for conducting electricity or holding things together in a pinch.

OldBook.name: Old Book
OldBook.description: A dusty, forgotten tome. Useful for enchanting or just pretending you can read.

RustyNails.name: Rusty Nails
RustyNails.description: Bent and oxidized nails. Perfect for adding to traps or tetanus shots.

WoodenPlanks.name: Wooden Planks
WoodenPlanks.description: Sturdy pieces of wood. Ideal for building structures or makeshift shields.
WoodenPlanks.effect: Used in building and crafting shields.

String.name: String
String.description: Simple but versatile, perfect for tying things together or setting up tripwires.

TinCan.name: Tin Can
TinCan.description: An empty can that once held food. Useful for makeshift armor or signaling devices.
TinCan.effect: Used in armor and noise makers.

ClothScraps.name: Cloth Scraps
ClothScraps.description: Pieces of fabric left overfrom who-knows-what. Ideal for bandages or simple clothing.

BrokenClock.name: Broken Clock
BrokenClock.description: A timepiece that no longer tells time. Perfect for parts or as a reminder of your impending doom.

Rope.name: Rope
Rope.description: A length of sturdy rope. Essential for climbing, binding, or creative punishments.
Rope.effect: Used in climbing gear and bindings.

Buttons.name: Buttons
Buttons.description: Assorted buttons from various garments. Useful for decorations or replacement parts.
Buttons.effect: Used in decorative items and repairs.

JarOfPickles.name: Jar of Pickles
JarOfPickles.description: A jar filled with preserved cucumbers. Can be eaten or used to distract hungry monsters.
JarOfPickles.effect: Used in food items and distractions.

EmptySack.name: Empty Sack
EmptySack.description: A burlap sack that once held something important. Now it’s just waiting to be filled with loot.
EmptySack.effect: Used in carrying bags and storage.

ShoeLaces.name: Shoe Laces
ShoeLaces.description: A pair of laces from an old pair of shoes. Great for tying things up or replacing broken cords.

OldMap.name: Old Map
OldMap.description: A faded map of a place that might not exist anymore. Useful for navigation or starting fires.
OldMap.effect: Used in navigational aids and kindling.

PlasticFork.name: Plastic Fork
PlasticFork.description: A single-use utensil that’s surprisingly sharp. Perfect for makeshift weapons or eating on the go.
PlasticFork.effect: Used in improvised weapons and eating tools.

BottleCap.name: Bottle Cap
BottleCap.description: A metal cap from a bottle of unknown origin. Useful for crafting small tools or as currency in some post-apocalyptic markets.
BottleCap.effect: Used in small tools and barter.

EmptyNotebook.name: Empty Notebook
EmptyNotebook.description: A blank notebook waiting to be filled with secrets or terrible poetry.

PieceOfChalk.name: Piece of Chalk
PieceOfChalk.description: A small piece of chalk, perfect for drawing runes or marking paths.
PieceOfChalk.effect: Used in crafting runes and navigation marks.

Feather.name: Feather
Feather.description: A loose feather from an unknown bird. Great for quills or tickling your enemies.
Feather.effect: Used in writing tools and distractions.

Matchsticks.name: Matchsticks
Matchsticks.description: A box of matchsticks, essential for starting fires or lighting up dark places.
Matchsticks.effect: Used in fire starters and light sources.

OldCoin.name: Old Coin
OldCoin.description: A tarnished coin from a forgotten realm. Useful for enchantments or bribing the easily impressed.
OldCoin.effect: Used in enchanting items and bribery.

TinFoil.name: Tin Foil
TinFoil.description: A crumpled piece of tin foil. Perfect for crafting makeshift hats or conducting electricity.
TinFoil.effect: Used in hats and electrical items.

PieceOfChalkboard.name: Piece of Chalkboard
PieceOfChalkboard.description: A fragment of a chalkboard, useful for temporary notes or as a bludgeoning weapon in a pinch.
PieceOfChalkboard.effect: Used in message boards and improvised weapons.

RustyKey.name: Rusty Key
RustyKey.description: An old, rusty key that probably doesn’t open anything important. Or does it?
RustyKey.effect: Used in lockpicks and mysterious artifacts.

PlasticBag.name: Plastic Bag
PlasticBag.description: A crinkly plastic bag. Useful for waterproofing or suffocating your enemies. We don’t judge.
PlasticBag.effect: Used in waterproof containers and traps.

Paperclip.name: Paperclip
Paperclip.description: A bent paperclip that’s seen better days. Ideal for lockpicking or holding papers together.
Paperclip.effect: Used in lockpicks and organizational tools.

BottleOfGlue.name: Bottle of Glue
BottleOfGlue.description: A sticky substance perfect for holding things together or making a mess.
BottleOfGlue.effect: Used in adhesive items and prank tools.

SpareTire.name: Spare Tire
SpareTire.description: A rubber tire that no longer fits any vehicle. Great for crafting rubber items or just rolling away.

CircuitBoard.name: Circuit Board
CircuitBoard.description: A small, outdated circuit board from an ancient device. Perfect for crafting electronic gadgets or just pretending you understand technology.

ResistorPack.name: Resistor Pack
ResistorPack.description: A bundle of resistors that probably don’t resist much anymore. Ideal for fine-tuning your homemade electronics or making tiny, ineffective barricades.

Capacitor.name: Capacitor
Capacitor.description: An electronic component that stores energy. Useful for powering small devices or giving your enemies a shocking surprise.

OldSmartphone.name: Old Smartphone
OldSmartphone.description: A cracked and outdated smartphone. Good for scavenging parts or impressing the technologically illiterate.

BrokenKeyboard.name: Broken Keyboard
BrokenKeyboard.description: An old keyboard missing a few keys. Great for harvesting parts or crafting a very ineffective weapon.

PlasticContainer.name: Plastic Container
PlasticContainer.description: A sturdy plastic container with a secure lid. Perfect for storing potions, small parts, or your collection of regrets.

MetalBox.name: Metal Box
MetalBox.description: A small, lockable metal box. Useful for securing valuables or creating a small, portable trap.

GlassJar.name: Glass Jar
GlassJar.description: A clear glass jar with a tight-fitting lid. Perfect for preserving ingredients or displaying your collection of questionable substances.

CardboardBox.name: Cardboard Box
CardboardBox.description: A simple, collapsible cardboard box. Ideal for temporary storage or crafting disguises that would fool no one.

BatteryPack.name: Battery Pack
BatteryPack.description: A pack of old batteries, some of which might still have a charge. Useful for powering devices or just creating sparks.

OldLaptop.name: Old Laptop
OldLaptop.description: An ancient laptop with a dead battery and a cracked screen. Good for scavenging parts or using as a very flat paperweight.

FlashDrive.name: Flash Drive
FlashDrive.description: A small, weathered USB flash drive. Ideal for storing important data or launching cyber-attacks on your enemies' patience.

PlasticTubing.name: Plastic Tubing
PlasticTubing.description: Flexible plastic tubes of varying lengths. Great for transferring liquids or crafting makeshift blowguns.

MetalCanister.name: Metal Canister
MetalCanister.description: A durable metal canister with a secure lid. Perfect for storing volatile substances or crafting small bombs.

RubberBands.name: Rubber Bands
RubberBands.description: A pile of rubber bands in various states of elasticity. Useful for binding things together or creating impromptu slingshots.

OldTelevision.name: Old Television
OldTelevision.description: A bulky, outdated television set. Good for scavenging electronic parts or as an incredibly impractical projectile.

MetalFlask.name: Metal Flask
MetalFlask.description: A small metal flask, ideal for carrying liquids. Useful for holding potions or just staying hydrated in style.

PlasticBucket.name: Plastic Bucket
PlasticBucket.description: A basic plastic bucket, great for carrying water or crafting helmet-like headgear.

WireSpool.name: Wire Spool
WireSpool.description: A spool of various types of wire, perfect for crafting or tripping hazards for those who annoy you.

OldCamera.name: Old Camera
OldCamera.description: A dusty old camera that may or may not work. Useful for scavenging optical parts or capturing the ghost of your lost dreams.
